verses.verse: And I turned,<WH7725> and lifted up<WH5375> mine eyes,<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> there came four chariots out<WH3318> <WH702> <WH4818> from between<WH4480> <WH996> two<WH8147> mountains;<WH2022> and the mountains<WH2022> were mountains<WH2022> of brass.<WH5178>
In the first<WH7223> chariot<WH4818> were red<WH122> horses;<WH5483> and in the second<WH8145> chariot<WH4818> black<WH7838> horses;<WH5483>
And in the third<WH7992> chariot<WH4818> white<WH3836> horses;<WH5483> and in the fourth<WH7243> chariot<WH4818> grizzled<WH1261> and bay<WH554> horses.<WH5483>
Then I answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me, What<WH4100> are these,<WH428> my lord?<WH113>

And the angel<WH4397> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, These<WH428> are the four<WH702> spirits<WH7307> of the heavens,<WH8064> which go forth<WH3318> from standing<WH4480> <WH3320> before<WH5921> the Lord<WH113> of all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

The black<WH7838> horses<WH5483> which<WH834> are therein go forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the north<WH6828> country;<WH776> and the white<WH3836> go forth<WH3318> after<WH413> <WH310> them; and the grizzled<WH1261> go forth<WH3318> toward<WH413> the south<WH8486> country.<WH776>

And the bay<WH554> went forth,<WH3318> and sought<WH1245> to go<WH1980> that they might walk to and fro<WH1980> through the earth:<WH776> and he said,<WH559> Get you hence,<WH1980> walk to and fro<WH1980> through the earth.<WH776> So they walked to and fro<WH1980> through the earth.<WH776>

Then cried<WH2199> he upon me, and spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH7200> these that go<WH3318> toward<WH413> the north<WH6828> country<WH776> have quieted<WH5117> <WH853> my spirit<WH7307> in the north<WH6828> country.<WH776>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Take <WH3947> of<WH4480> <WH854> them of the captivity,<WH1473> even of Heldai,<WH4480> <WH2469> of<WH4480> <WH854> Tobijah,<WH2900> and of<WH4480> <WH854> Jedaiah,<WH3048> which<WH834> are come<WH935> from Babylon,<WH4480> <WH894> and come<WH935> thou<WH859> the same<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and go<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Josiah<WH2977> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah;<WH6846>

Then take<WH3947> silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> and make<WH6213> crowns,<WH5850> and set<WH7760> them upon the head<WH7218> of Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Josedech,<WH3087> the high<WH1419> priest;<WH3548>

And speak<WH559> unto<WH413> him, saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> speaketh<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> saying,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> the man<WH376> whose name<WH8034> is The BRANCH;<WH6780> and he shall grow up<WH6779> out of his place,<WH4480> <WH8478> and he shall build<WH1129> <WH853> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Even he<WH1931> shall build<WH1129> <WH853> the temple<WH1964> of the LORD;<WH3068> and he<WH1931> shall bear<WH5375> the glory,<WH1935> and shall sit<WH3427> and rule<WH4910> upon<WH5921> his throne;<WH3678> and he shall be<WH1961> a priest<WH3548> upon<WH5921> his throne:<WH3678> and the counsel<WH6098> of peace<WH7965> shall be<WH1961> between<WH996> them both.<WH8147>

And the crowns<WH5850> shall be<WH1961> to Helem,<WH2494> and to Tobijah,<WH2900> and to Jedaiah,<WH3048> and to Hen<WH2581> the son<WH1121> of Zephaniah,<WH6846> for a memorial<WH2146> in the temple<WH1964> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And they that are far off<WH7350> shall come<WH935> and build<WH1129> in the temple<WH1964> of the LORD,<WH3068> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath sent<WH7971> me unto<WH413> you. And this shall come to pass,<WH1961> if<WH518> ye will diligently obey<WH8085> <WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
